title: (Stabilisation) Act 2010 (No. 36 of 2010) are delegated to Seán Fleming,
heading: 1. This Order may be cited as the Finance (Delegation of Ministerial
text_raw:
1. This Order may be cited as the Finance (Delegation of Ministerial 

Functions) Order 2020.
text_norm: 1 order may cited finance (delegation ministerial functions) order 2020

title: (Stabilisation) Act 2010 (No. 36 of 2010) are delegated to Seán Fleming,
heading: 2. The powers and duties of the Minister for Finance conferred on him by
text_raw:
2. The powers and duties of the Minister for Finance conferred on him by 
or under subsections (2) and (3) of section 67 of the Credit Institutions 
(Stabilisation) Act 2010 (No. 36 of 2010) are delegated to Seán Fleming, 
Minister of State at the Department of Finance. 

GIVEN under the Official Seal of the Government, 

8 December, 2020. 

MICHEÁL MARTIN, 

Taoiseach. 

Notice of the making of this Statutory Instrument was published in 
“Iris Oifigiúil” of 11th December, 2020. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 [646] 3
